get.description: Get information of specified contracts that can be traded. This API will return a list of tradable contracts, including some key parameters of the contract such as the symbol name, tick size, mark price,etc.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Path Parameter. Symbol of the contract

code.description: 200000 is for success, other is error

x-api-enum.name: FFWCSX
x-api-enum.description: Standardized swap contracts standard financial futures on swap, expiration swap funding rate

expireDate.description: Expiration date(millisecond). Null means it will never expire

settleDate.description: Settlement date(millisecond). Null indicates that automatic settlement is not supported

settleCurrency.description: Currency used to clear and settle the trades

multiplier.description: The basic unit of the contract API is lots. For the number of coins in each lot, please refer to the param multiplier. For example, for XBTUSDTM, multiplier=0.001, which corresponds to the value of each XBTUSDTM contract being 0.001 BTC. There is also a special case. All coin-swap contracts, such as each XBTUSDM contract, correspond to 1 USD.

isInverse.description: Whether it is a reverse contract

fairMethod.description: Fair price marking method, The Futures contract is null

fundingBaseSymbol.description: Ticker symbol of the based currency

fundingQuoteSymbol.description: Ticker symbol of the quote currency

sourceExchanges.description: The contract index price source exchange

fundingBaseSymbol1M.description: Base currency interest rate symbol(1 minute)

fundingQuoteSymbol1M.description: Quote currency interest rate symbol(1 minute)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get information of specified contracts that can be traded. This API will return a list of tradable contracts, including some key parameters of the contract such as the symbol name, tick size, mark price,etc.

        "riskStep": 0,
        "makerFeeRate": 2.0E-4,
        "takerFeeRate": 6.0E-4,
        "takerFixFee": 0.0,
        "makerFixFee": 0.0,
        "settlementFee": null,
        "isDeleverage": true,
        "isQuanto": false,
        "isInverse": true,
        "markMethod": "FairPrice",
        "fairMethod": "FundingRate",
        "fundingBaseSymbol": ".XBTINT8H",
        "fundingQuoteSymbol": ".USDINT8H",
        "fundingRateSymbol": ".XBTUSDMFPI8H",
        "indexSymbol": ".BXBT",
        "settlementSymbol": null,
        "status": "Open",
        "fundingFeeRate": 1.75E-4,
        "predictedFundingFeeRate": 1.76E-4,
        "fundingRateGranularity": 28800000,
        "openInterest": "61725904",
        "turnoverOf24h": 209.56303473,

        "markPrice": 68336.7,

        "maxLeverage": 75,

            "bitstamp",

        "premiumsSymbol1M": ".XBTUSDMPI",

get.description: Get detailed information of all contracts that can be traded. This API will return a list of tradable contracts, including some key parameters of the contract such as the symbol name, tick size, mark price,etc.

code.description: 200000 is for success, other is error

x-api-enum.name: FFWCSX
x-api-enum.description: Standardized swap contracts standard financial futures on swap, expiration swap funding rate

expireDate.description: Expiration date(millisecond). Null means it will never expire

settleDate.description: Settlement date(millisecond). Null indicates that automatic settlement is not supported

settleCurrency.description: Currency used to clear and settle the trades

multiplier.description: The basic unit of the contract API is lots. For the number of coins in each lot, please refer to the param multiplier. For example, for XBTUSDTM, multiplier=0.001, which corresponds to the value of each XBTUSDTM contract being 0.001 BTC. There is also a special case. All coin-swap contracts, such as each XBTUSDM contract, correspond to 1 USD.

isInverse.description: Whether it is a reverse contract

fairMethod.description: Fair price marking method, The Futures contract is null

fundingBaseSymbol.description: Ticker symbol of the based currency

fundingQuoteSymbol.description: Ticker symbol of the quote currency

sourceExchanges.description: The contract index price source exchange

fundingBaseSymbol1M.description: Base currency interest rate symbol(1 minute)

fundingQuoteSymbol1M.description: Quote currency interest rate symbol(1 minute)

get.description: This endpoint returns "last traded price/size""best bid/ask price/size" etc. of a single symbol. These messages can also be obtained through Websocket.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

code.description: 200000 is for success, other is error

sequence.description: Sequence number, used to judge whether the messages pushed by Websocket is continuous.

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

side.description: Filled side, The trade side indicates the taker order side. A taker order is the order that was matched with orders opened on the order book.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint returns "last traded price/size""best bid/ask price/size" etc. of a single symbol. These messages can also be obtained through Websocket.

get.description: This endpoint returns "last traded price/size""best bid/ask price/size" etc. of a single symbol. These messages can also be obtained through Websocket.

code.description: 200000 is for success, other is error

sequence.description: Sequence number, used to judge whether the messages pushed by Websocket is continuous.

size.description: Filled side, The trade side indicates the taker order side. A taker order is the order that was matched with orders opened on the order book.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint returns "last traded price/size""best bid/ask price/size" etc. of a single symbol. These messages can also be obtained through Websocket.

get.description: Query for Full orderbook depth data. (aggregated by price)  It is generally used by professional traders because it uses more server resources and traffic, and we have strict access rate limit control.  To maintain up-to-date Order Book, please use Websocket incremental feed after retrieving the OrderBook.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

code.description: 200000 is for success, other is error

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Query for Full orderbook depth data. (aggregated by price)  It is generally used by professional traders because it uses more server resources and traffic, and we have strict access rate limit control.  To maintain up-to-date Order Book, please use Websocket incremental feed after retrieving the OrderBook.

get.description: Query for part orderbook depth data. (aggregated by price)  You are recommended to request via this endpoint as the system reponse would be faster and cosume less traffic.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Get the depth layer, optional value: 20, 100

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Query for part orderbook depth data. (aggregated by price)  You are recommended to request via this endpoint as the system reponse would be faster and cosume less traffic.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the trade history of the specified symbol, the returned quantity is the last 100 transaction records.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

side.description: Filled side, The trade side indicates the taker order side. A taker order is the order that was matched with orders opened on the order book.

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the trade history of the specified symbol, the returned quantity is the last 100 transaction records.

get.description: Get the Kline of the symbol. Data are returned in grouped buckets based on requested type. For each query, the system would return at most 500 pieces of data. To obtain more data, please page the data by time.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol, indexSymbol, premiumsSymbol1M, premiumsSymbol8H](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.description: Type of candlestick patterns(minute)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start time (milisecond)

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End time (milisecond)

items.description: Start time of the candle cycle, opening price, highest price, Lowest price, closing price, Transaction volume

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get the Kline of the symbol. Data are returned in grouped buckets based on requested type. For each query, the system would return at most 500 pieces of data. To obtain more data, please page the data by time.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: indexSymbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Start time (milisecond)

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milisecond)

parameters.name: reverse
parameters.description: This parameter functions to judge whether the lookup is reverse. True means yes. False means no. This parameter is set as True by default.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Start offset. The unique attribute of the last returned result of the last request. The data of the first page will be returned by default.

parameters.name: forward
parameters.description: This parameter functions to judge whether the lookup is forward or not. True means yes and False means no. This parameter is set as true by default

parameters.name: maxCount
parameters.description: Max record count. The default record count is 10, The maximum length cannot exceed 100

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: indexSymbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

get.description: Get the statistics of the platform futures trading volume in the last 24 hours.

turnoverOf24h.description: 24-hour platform Futures trading volume. Unit is USD

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get the statistics of the platform futures trading volume in the last 24 hours.

get.description: Get the API server time. This is the Unix timestamp.
get.x-sdk-method-description: Get the API server time. This is the Unix timestamp.

status.description: Status of service: opennormal transaction, closeStop Trading/Maintenance, cancelonlycan only cancel the order but not place order

x-api-enum.name: CANCELONLY
x-api-enum.description: can only cancel the order but not place order

post.description: This interface can obtain the token required for websocket to establish a Futures connection. If you need use public channels (e.g. all public market data), please make request as follows to obtain the server list and public token

token.description: The token required to establish a websocket connection

endpoint.description: Websocket domain URL, It is recommended to use a dynamic URL as the URL may change

encrypt.description: Whether to encrypt. Currently only supports wss, not ws

post.x-sdk-method-description: This interface can obtain the token required for websocket to establish a Futures connection. If you need use public channels (e.g. all public market data), please make request as follows to obtain the server list and public token

post.description: This interface can obtain the token required for websocket to establish a Futures private connection. If you need use private channels(e.g. account balance notice), please make request as follows to obtain the server list and private token

token.description: The token required to establish a websocket connection

endpoint.description: Websocket domain URL, It is recommended to use a dynamic URL as the URL may change

encrypt.description: Whether to encrypt. Currently only supports wss, not ws

post.x-sdk-method-description: This interface can obtain the token required for websocket to establish a Futures private connection. If you need use private channels(e.g. account balance notice), please make request as follows to obtain the server list and private token
